passage_text: Mika /mi-ka/ [2 sylls.] as a girls' name is of Japanese origin, and the meaning of Mika is beautiful aroma; beautiful increase. Mika is a somewhat popular first name for women (#3018 out of 4276, Top 71%) and an even more popular last name for all people (#11893 out of 150436, Top 8%). (2000 U.S. Census). Popular variation forms of Mika (not in Top 1000) are Micah (#994 a year ago) and Dominique.

Comments and insights on the name Mika: | Edit. Kami and Mika are anagrams of each other; they contain the same letters. Mika is a Japanese name for girls, pronounced 'MEE-kah'. It has been quite popular in Japan since the 1960's, especially in the 70's/80's, but it's still reasonably well-used today. It's also popular among Japanese-Americans and Japanese living abroad, since it blends in well with English/European girl's names.
